meanings: Noun 이든. Sir (Robert) Anthony Eden, Earl of Avon(1897-1977)(영국의 보수당 정치가; 수상(1955-57))

vlive.korean: 이든이 태초에! 에덴동산! 여기서 따온 건데요. At the beginning of the world! The Garden of Eden! It's from that. 듣기 View video Hidden Track No.V : [비투비 예능 훈련소] EP02. 주간 비투비 Weekly BTOB - 이든(EDEN)
vlive.english: At the beginning of the world! The Garden of Eden! It's from that.

vlive.korean: [#MV 코멘터리] ['에덴'의 뮤직비디오 코멘터리 시간!] [#MV Commentary] [Time to hear commentary for "EDEN" MV!] View video OSEN : 아이즈 '에덴' 뮤비 코멘터리
vlive.english: [#MV Commentary] [Time to hear commentary for "EDEN" MV!]

vlive.korean: [Q. 타이틀곡 '에덴'은?] - 제가 하나요? - 내가 할까? [Q. About your title song, "EDEN??"] - Do I do this? - Should I? 듣기 View video OSEN : "1년만의 컴백" IZ 아이즈, 인터뷰 대공개
vlive.english: [Q. About your title song, "EDEN??"] - Do I do this? - Should I?

vlive.korean: 지금 '에덴동산?' There's a comment. "The Garden of Eden"? 듣기 View video 스튜디오 룰루랄라 (Studio LuluLala) : [취중막말] ep.7 진운X동한 허언·관종 환장의 콜라보! (ps. BTS덕후 동한)
vlive.english: There's a comment. "The Garden of Eden"?

vlive.korean: 뭔가 약간 숙소 가면 '에덴동산' 같은 느낌. Our dorm is like the Garden of Eden. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK!] UP10TION - HIGHLIGHT
vlive.english: Our dorm is like the Garden of Eden.

examples.korean: When Spanish conquerors arrived in Mexico in the 16th century, they found a veritable Eden and quickly despoiled it. 발음듣기 16세기에 스페인 정복자들이 멕시코에 도착했을 때 그들은 진짜 에덴을 발견하고는 즉시 약탈했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When Spanish conquerors arrived in Mexico in the 16th century, they found a veritable Eden and quickly despoiled it. 발음

examples.korean: East of Eden' actor Song Seung-heon also agreed to drop his salary from 70 million won per episode to 35 million won. 발음듣기 에덴의 동쪽'의 배우 송승헌도 자신의 출연료를 회당 7,000만원에서 3,500 만원으로 내리기로 합의했다. Neungyule
examples.english: East of Eden' actor Song Seung-heon also agreed to drop his salary from 70 million won per episode to 35 million won. 발음

examples.korean: Many people believe that the Garden of Eden was in Iraq. 발음듣기 많은 사람들은 에덴 동산이 이라크에 있었다고 믿고 있습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Many people believe that the Garden of Eden was in Iraq. 발음

examples.korean: He gained fame through his roles in big hit dramas including ‘Summer Scent’and ‘East of Eden.’ 발음듣기 그는 ‘여름 향기’와 ‘에덴의 동쪽’을 포함한 빅 히트 드라마들에서의 역할로 인기를 얻었다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: He gained fame through his roles in big hit dramas including ‘Summer Scent’and ‘East of Eden.’ 발음

examples.korean: Adam and Eve ate the apple from the Tree of Life in the Garden of Eden on Friday. 발음듣기 아담과 이브도 금요일에 에덴 동산에서 생명의 사과나무 사과를 따먹었어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Adam and Eve ate the apple from the Tree of Life in the Garden of Eden on Friday. 발음
